title: President tells Nation: National unity first task; Eradication of poverty requires true bravery:
content: Our first task is to ensure lasting national unity and sustainable, permanent peace in our motherland, said President Mahinda Rajapaksa addressing the Nation after being sworn in as President for the second term yesterday morning. “I believe that the eradication of poverty is greater than the defeat of uprisings. It requires true bravery,” he added….
